exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective vitamin B1 250 mg per capsule - Each vegan-friendly capsule contains 250 mg of vitamin B1 (thiamine hydrochloride). Vitamin B1 is an essential nutrient that helps the body convert food into energy, maintain a healthy nervous system and brain, and promotes normal energy metabolism. Our supplement is not genetically modified and manufactured according to GMP standards, the highest manufacturing standards in the world.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Vitamin B1 offers powerful and high-quality thiamine, manufactured in a GMP compliant facility. Each capsule provides 250 mg vitamin B1, a vital nutrient for converting food into energy, supporting nerve function, and aiding carbohydrate, protein and fat metabolism. While found in several foods, this supplement is essential for anyone needing additional nutrient intake. Each bottle contains 180 capsules of easy-to-swallow capsules suitable for vegans and vegetarians.
ingredientsContent: Thiamine hydrochloride (vitamin B1), rice flour, capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropylmethylcellulose).
informationContent: Units: 83.0 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule
